Articles.Content:
Hi all,

While the use of Imgur is nice, I've had a hosting account / domain (including dedicated IP) for many years now. I'd prefer to leverage that instead.

The problem is that I've not found any in the past that worked very well with Wordpress. I'm looking again now, so perhaps that has changed. But was also hoping that someone here has looked around and could recommend something.

I'm OK with the fact that it will not be embedded - my site would provide that interface on another page. I'm also quite OK if it requires something complex for the server install - I do those kinds of things for a living, so should not be too bad.

Thanks in advance,

--TSK
